Name: bleed
name: Bleed
description: Minor damage over time from slashing wounds.

Name: exposed
name: Exposed
description: Armor slightly reduced, making the target easier to hit.

Name: staggered
name: Staggered
description: Briefly disrupts actions, causing a short delay.

Name: burn
name: Burn
description: Minor damage over time from fire.

Name: soaked
name: Soaked
description: Slight slow and reduced evasion.

Name: disoriented
name: Disoriented
description: Slight accuracy and cast-speed reduction.

Name: cracked
name: Cracked
description: Armor or resistance slightly reduced.

Name: poisoned
name: Poisoned
description: Minor damage over time and small healing reduction.

Name: dazed
name: Dazed
description: Brief focus loss and short control window.

Name: marked
name: Marked
description: Evasion reduced; target is easier to track.

Name: hexed
name: Hexed
description: Slightly reduced damage dealt.

Name: fortified
name: Fortified
description: Increases physical and magic protection.

Name: haste
name: Haste
description: Increases attack and movement speed.

Name: regeneration
name: Regeneration
description: Gradually restores health over time.

Name: mana-surge
name: Mana Surge
description: Gradually restores mana and boosts spell output slightly.

Name: blessed
name: Blessed
description: Increases outgoing damage and healing slightly.

Name: barrier
name: Barrier
description: Absorbs a small amount of incoming damage.

Name: weakened
name: Weakened
description: Reduces outgoing physical and magic damage.

Name: vulnerable
name: Vulnerable
description: Reduces protection and increases incoming damage.

Name: silenced
name: Silenced
description: Prevents casting abilities for a short duration.

Name: rooted
name: Rooted
description: Prevents movement but still allows actions.

Name: chilled
name: Chilled
description: Reduces attack speed and movement speed.

Name: cursed
name: Cursed
description: Reduces healing received and critical chance.
